about_the_game:
A sex simulation game with visual novel elements where you play the role of a guy who wants to hire the hottest women for his new bar.

GAME DESCRIPTION

Step into a world of seduction and fulfill your fantasies with our “Sex Simulation” series!
In this video game, you take on the role of a charming bar owner who wants to staff his place with the most attractive women.
His quest to find a manager, bartenders, and waitresses is not easy, but he’s willing to do whatever it takes to create the naughtiest team.
Engage in inciting conversations and assess the skills of each potential hire.
Immerse yourself in breathtaking visuals as you negotiate the terms of their employment.
Will you prioritize physical appearance over talent? How will you handle the consequences of your actions in this world full of pleasure?
Play “Bar Staff” and find out!

FEATURES
90+ HD quality renders
HD animations

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over.
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral, vaginal, anal, masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.
Contains straight sex scenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
